About

I’m Lisa. (she/her/it) I’m a multidisciplinary artist from Toronto. My work spans digital art, graphic design, type design, creative writing, dj, whatever. I’m cute and I do a little bit of everything.

You might also know me as Mel, ncb0, nezu, etc. I look like this →

Availability

I am available for freelance work~ I do album covers, flyers, etc.
